column1: Uchi////This is my favorite sushi spot. Hands down! But
column2: I'm not surprised because all great restaurants get their start in Austin. Uchi's no different! It can be a bit pricey though
column3: so if you're going to try it
column4: you should go to happy hour. There are deals you cannot beat! And
column5: get there early because the line will be wrapped around the building! My favorite thing on the menu is the ham and eggs roll... delightful!
